```{r}

steam_data
```

```{r}
colnames(steam_data)
Genres <- steam_data %>% select ("steamspy_tags")
Genres
```


```{r}
steam_filtered <- steam_data %>% 
  filter (genres %in% c("Action", "FPS", "Sci-Fi", "Puzzle", "Indie","Strategy","RPG", "Racing", "Casual", "Horror", "Stealth", "Shooter", "Simulation"))
steam_filtered
```

```{r}
number_of_games<- steam_data %>% 
  group_by(genres) %>% 
  summarise(count = n())

number_of_games
ggplot(number_of_games, aes(x = genres, y = count)) +
 geom_col(state = 'identity')
```
```{r}
number_of_games<- steam_filtered %>% 
  group_by("Action", "FPS", "Sci-Fi", "Puzzle", "Indie","Strategy","RPG", "Racing", "Casual", "Horror", "Stealth", "Shooter", "Simulation") %>% 
  summarise(count = n())

number_of_games
ggplot(number_of_games, aes(x = steam_filtered, y = number_of_games)) +
 geom_col() #state = 'identity'
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = steam_data) +
```
